node_2: main article: list of accolades received by bajirao mastani
edge: The main article discusses the accolades and awards that the movie 'Bajirao Mastani' has received.
The movie 'Bajirao Mastani' won 7 awards at the 63rd National Film Awards, including Best Director and Best Cinematography.
The actress Tanvi Azmi won the award for Best Supporting Actress at various awards ceremonies, including the 63rd National Film Awards, for her performance in 'Bajirao Mastani'.
The actor Ranveer Singh won the award for Best Actor at various awards ceremonies, including the 61st Filmfare Awards, for his performance in 'Bajirao Mastani'.
The movie 'Bajirao Mastani' received 5 nominations, including Best Film, at the 14th Asian Film Awards.
The movie 'Bajirao Mastani' won the award for Best Special Effects at various awards ceremonies, including the 14th Asian Film Awards.
